00344     /*
00345      * \brief Append a new UnverifiedKeyBinding element
00346      *
00347      * Allows callers to append a new UnverifiedKeyBinding item.
00348      * The item is initially empty of KeyInfo elements - these must be added
00349      * by the caller.
00350      *
00351      * @returns the newly created UnverifiedKeyBinding object (already inserted
00352      * in the LocateResult
00353      */
